properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 4 at 9:02PM PST until February 5 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...South-southwest wind of 20 to 25 kt with gusts of 30 to
35 kt. Seas building to 12 to 14 feet at 16 seconds overnight.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY
